LanguageData.NFS.RegularGameplay.Tooltip: When slowdown is triggered:\n- Force game speed to x1\n- Lock time controls
LanguageData.NFS.DisableGamespeedLock.Tooltip: When slowdown is triggered:\n- Force game speed to x1\n- Do not lock time controls
LanguageData.NFS.DisableGamespeedSlowdown.Tooltip: When slowdown is triggered:\n- Do not force game speed\n- Do not lock time controls
LanguageData.NFS.MinSecondsToNextSlowdown.Tooltip: Only valid if "Unlock time controls" is selected.\n\nThe minimum amount of time (in real-time seconds) after one slowdown, before a new slowdown can be triggered.
